about_the_game:
■SUMMARY
Princess Anastia lived a graceful life in her kingdom.
One day, a rebel broke out due to heavy taxes and exploitation, and the capital fell.
Anastia managed to escape, but she was cursed by a sorcerer from the rebel army.

She narrowly escaped to an unknown village where blizzards raged.
Unable to flee further, she's stuck in this village full of monsters and men.
Cursed to become pregnant with the seed of any species, what fate awaits Anastia?



This is an RPG-style sandbox simulation with Live2D animation on 3D field.
The game centers around interspecies impregnation.
Anastia may resign to her fate and let someone rape her,
or resist before getting raped, or lose a battle and inevitably get raped,
or willingly offer her body, or get raped unknowingly in her sleep.
Everything's free for you to decide!



▽You can freely roam 3D field as you complete various quests from the landlord.
　There will be no level or any other restrictions.


▽Open world RPG focused on H events!


・Over 30 Live2D H animations
・Over 350 heroine voices
・Over 1000 H texts
・Over 15 variations of villagers and monsters
・High-resolution gameplay with original game application
・Cross-section view can be turned ON/OFF at any time!
・Skip option available for players who prefer to avoid birth scenes
　（There will also be option to avoid pregnancy entirely♪)


▽About Fertilization and Birth


The Curse accelerates Anastia's menstrual cycle into 10min of playtime per cycle.
Menstruation → Ovulation → Fertilization → Pregnancy → Giving birth

Eggs and sperm are stored as items in "inventory", each with its own lifespan.
If sperm is present in the vagina during ovulation, fertilization can occur.
Due to the curse, fertilization is possible with sperm from any species, not just humans.

If time passes without any issues, the process continues from a fertilized egg to a fetus,
and eventually to childbirth.
(After birth, the child is taken in by the church.)

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content not appropriate for all ages:
Nudity, sexual scenes, prostitution, non-consensual sex, sex with monsters, pregnancy with both human and non-human.

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

name: Fallen Princess Knight

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3GHz以上
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
